name: Regirock
author: Kouki Saitou
flavor_text: The same rocks that form its body have been found in ground layers around the world.

ancient_trait.name: Ω  Barrier
ancient_trait.effect: Whenever your opponent plays a Trainer card (excluding Pokémon Tools and Stadium cards), prevent all effects of that card done to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Land Maker
attacks.effect: Put 2 Stadium cards from your discard pile into your hand.

attacks.name: Stone Edge
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 40 more damage.
